pl.edu.uj.project.core

Class FileTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.uj.project.core.FileTree

  • public class FileTree
extends java.lang.Object
    FileTree is consisted from files and folders that have same root path. And in the max scan depth from root. Count and get files, folders or statistic.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Anton Bondarenko. b.anton.m.1986@gmail.com

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileTree

        public FileTree(java.nio.file.Path root,
                int maxScanDepth)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create tree with root and max scn depth.
        Parameters:
        root - path of FileTree.
        maxScanDepth - max scan depth from root, for files which will bw included to FileTree. If depth < 0 then depth == 1.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when root is null, not exist, readable == false.
